statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM CustomerData WHERE crm_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT phone_number, crm_id FROM CustomerData WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_history->'last_interaction' AS last_interaction FROM CustomerData WHERE crm_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT(crms_id) AS total_crms, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM CustomerData GROUP BY crms_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_id, o.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 3
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteraction;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteraction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteraction WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT crm_id, customer_id, crm_system FROM CRMSoftware WHERE last_sync < NOW();
SELECT history_event, history_notes FROM CustomerHistory ORDER BY history_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteraction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteraction WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteraction WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT ci.customer_id, ci.interaction_type, crm.crm_system FROM CustomerInteraction ci LEFT JOIN CRMSoftware crm ON ci.customer_id = crm.customer_id;
SELECT ch.customer_id, ch.history_date, ch.history_event, cs.crm_system FROM CustomerHistory ch INNER JOIN CRMSoftware cs ON ch.customer_id = cs.customer_id ORDER BY ch.history_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345';
SELECT interaction_type, description FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'c0b13115-5721-48d2-bb1d-a95849f7235d';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING count(*) > 3;
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.first_name, orders.total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT rep_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT customers.first_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
